name: Mecha8
overview: Merciless aliens are overrunning a small planet, they took by surprise to all the army. Now the last remaining defense is the Mecha Research's Lab and its unique two mechas, but them are the most powerful! Go ahead and guide Tricia Thunder on board Mecha-8 to gain again the freedom! It was presented at the MSXdev'11 contest and later an enhanced version was released in physical format.
